rotate_knob.description: Rotate the knob to turn on or off the switch.

clean_switch_frame.description: Clean the switch frame to remove dust or any other particles.

clean_whole_switch.description: Clean the entire switch including the knob and the switch frame.

initialize_switch.description: Initialize the switch by rotating the knob.

clean_knob.description: Clean the knob to ensure smooth rotation.

operate_switch.description: Operate the switch by rotating the knob.
